{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Barmak:''' The [[Kalimi Exchange]] welcomes all law-abiding businessmen.
:{{DIcon}} And you are...
::'''Barmak:''' I'm a [[Sumeru Akademiya|Mahamata]] at the Kalimi Exchange. I'm responsible for monitoring the Exchange for any illegal or fraudulent practices.
::'''Barmak:''' I myself am a researcher with a degree in economics, so there's no speculation that can get past me.
:{{DIcon}} See you.
::'''Barmak:''' See you.
{{Dialogue End}}
